message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn! Let's be reasonable, this split is better for both of us in the long run.
I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers
Time is running out, Alice. This is a fair deal, take it before inflation eats away at your share even more!
I'll take a smaller share than before, but I still think I deserve the bigger half
Alice, this is as generous as I can be. Let's close this deal and both go home happy.
